review: Gave this to my daughter who lives next door and doesn't have cable.  She loves to watch TV series.  With the tv stick logged in to my wireless network she gets superior audio and video on her 42 in HDTV an home theater system.  Setup was a snap and the menu was easy to follow to make changes.  Best 39 dollars I ever spent on entertainment electronics.
